2072.subject: HPWE
2072.descrlong: Examines issues of service, social justice and social responsibility as they relate to human performance and wellness education.  Each student serves at least 40 hours in a setting that relates to his or her concentration and provides health - and wellness-related service to a marginalized sector of the tri-county community.  Concurrent or previous enrollment in HPWE 300.

2073.subject: HPWE
2073.descrlong: Examines issues of service, social justice and social responsibility as they relate to human performance and wellness education.  Each student serves at least 40 hours in a setting that relates to his or her concentration and provides health - and wellness-related service to a marginalized sector of the tri-county community.  Concurrent or previous enrollment in HPWE 300.

2074.subject: HPWE
2074.descrlong: Examines issues of service, social justice, and social responsibility as they relate to Kinesiology and wellness. Each student serves at least 40 hours in a setting that relates to his or her concentration and provides health and wellness related service to a marginalized sector of the Tri-county community. Concurrent or previous enrollment in HPWE 300. (Offered every semester.)

2081.subject: HPWE
2081.descrlong: Examines issues of service, social justice, and social responsibility as they relate to Kinesiology and wellness. Each student serves at least 40 hours in a setting that relates to his or her concentration and provides health and wellness related service to a marginalized sector of the Tri-county community. Concurrent or previous enrollment in HPWE 300. (Offered every semester.)
